Text: Astoria is the fourth studio album recorded by Canadian rock band Marianas Trench.

Text: Astoria (Marianas Trench album):  The album represents the band's official return to the music scene after promotion of their previous album, "Ever After" (2011), ended in 2013, and was preceded by the retrospective EP, "Something Old / Something New" earlier in 2015.
